headline: Universal Health at 9.6X Earnings: A Rare Discount in Hospital Stocks?
summary: UHS trades at just 9.6X forward earnings, below peers and its own history, as steady volume growth, rising margins and strong cash flows lift investor appeal.

raw.headline: Universal Health at 9.6X Earnings: A Rare Discount in Hospital Stocks?

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Universal Health Services After Its Strong 2025 Share Price Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Universal Health Services is still good value after a strong multi year run, you are not alone. This breakdown will help clarify whether the current price still stacks up against its fundamentals. The stock has climbed 25.2% year to date and 28.5% over the last year, even after a slightly softer recent patch, with a 0.1% move over 7 days and a 1.7% slip across the past month. Behind these moves, investors have been watching the broader healthcare policy backdrop,...
